General.Name: BlockPay
General.Description:
Blockpay is a cryptocurrency point-of-sale system that allows merchants to easily receive cryptocurrency payments. Blockpay supports Bitcoin, Bitshares, Ether, Litecoin, Dash, Dogecoin, Steem, and Peercoin. Customers can even pay for goods or services with smartcoins like bitUSD or bitCNY.

Blockpay offers many advantages over traditional systems, such as fraud, ID theft, chargebacks and rolling reserves. It can be used with the existing equipment and the software itself is free.

Blockpay tokens were issued on the Bitshares blockchain and represent a share in the revenues of Blockpay, meaning that Blockpay tokens allow users to share in the rewards from BlockPay transactions as well as value 
increases from products built by the Company.
